thread.title: Tesla shares fall as U.S. opens probe into fatal crash

title: Tesla shares fall as U.S. opens probe into fatal crash
text:
Tesla shares fall as U.S. opens probe into fatal crash 6:02pm IST - 01:52 
A fatal crash and vehicle fire of a Tesla Inc Model X near Mountain View, California, last week has prompted a federal field investigation, the U.S. National Transportation Safety Board said on Tuesday. As Kate King reports, it triggered a big selloff in not only Tesla stock, but battery maker Panasonic as well.
